title: Thobe falls below ankles when I bend, walk, or lean & covers them fully, is it ok? assim al hakeem
transcript: which is almost five centimeters above my ankles but when i walk or lean on something my throat covers my ankles fully what counts my friend is your standing position if your sobe your garment your trousers while standing straight is above your ankles and not covering it you're safe definitely the moment you bend for roku or sit or lean down it's going to go down because you're shorter in height and this has no impact on you none whatsoever what counts is the length while you are in normal standing position you
